main event: A civilian reported observing a circular saucer hovering above Brenham High School in Texas on September 5, 1964.
interesting points: A student and Physics teacher Mr. Yancey also witnessed the saucer., The saucer was approximately 30 feet in diameter and hovered about 50 feet off the ground., The area lit up bright green when the object rose straight up., The object faded from sight rapidly after hovering momentarily., The observer expressed doubt regarding conventional explanations for the event.
witness description: a civilian, a student, and a Physics teacher
